# Tome of the Transmuter (Level 8 Transmuter)
## Overview
*This simple book is bound in white leather with a silver clasp. Careful notes on economic theory in a crisp and precise hand occupy the last few written pages, after which there is a page stained with a dark reddish-brown smear. The rest of the pages are blank.*

**Protection** Good lock (DC 30), *[[Explosive Runes (Spell)|explosive runes]]* (Reflex DC 16)

**Opposition Schools** Illusion, necromancy

**Value** 1,810 gp (2,610 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Spells**

4th—*[[Beast Shape II (Spell)|beast shape II]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Calcific Touch (Spell)|calcific touch]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Confusion (Spell)|confusion]]*, *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]*, *[[Stone Shape (Spell)|stone shape]]* <sup>S</sup>

3rd—*[[Arcane Sight (Spell)|arcane sight]]*, *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, *[[Explosive Runes (Spell)|explosive runes]]*, *[[Lightning Bolt (Spell)|lightning bolt]]*, *[[Magic Weapon, Greater (Spell)|greater magic weapon]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Slow (Spell)|slow]]* <sup>S</sup>

2nd—*[[Alter Self (Spell)|alter self]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Flaming Sphere (Spell)|flaming sphere]]*, *[[Knock (Spell)|knock]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Pyrotechnics (Spell)|pyrotechnics]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Resist Energy (Spell)|resist energy]]*, *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]*, *[[Whispering Wind (Spell)|whispering wind]]* <sup>S</sup>

1st—*[[Animate Rope (Spell)|animate rope]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Charm Person (Spell)|charm person]]*, *[[Color Spray (Spell)|color spray]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Erase (Spell)|erase]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Floating Disk (Spell)|floating disk]]*, *hush*, *[[Mage Armor (Spell)|mage armor]]*, *[[Magic Missile (Spell)|magic missile]]*, *[[Protection From Chaos (Spell)|protection from chaos]]*, *[[Unseen Servant (Spell)|unseen servant]]*

0—standard plus *drench*, *[[Spark (Spell)|spark]]*

**Preparation Ritual**

**Defensive Transmutation (Su)** When taking another shape, you can increase your defenses. Spend this boon’s effect as a free action when you cast a transmutation spell with a range of personal. As long as you are affected by that spell, you gain a +2 natural armor bonus for the duration of the spell.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 123
